items.name: simple_secret
items.description: A simple secret demo with only basic configuration

items.name: docker_config_secret
items.description: You can create a dockerconfigjson Secret to store the credentials for accessing a container image registry

items.name: basic_auth_secret
items.description: BasicAuth secret provided for storing credentials needed for basic authentication. When using this Secret type, the data field of the Secret must contain one of the username and password.

items.name: immutable_secret
items.description: [k8s v1.19+] Set immutable field as true to ensures that data stored in the Secret cannot be updated (only object metadata can be modified).

items.name: string_data_secret
items.description:
If you do not want to perform the base64 encoding, you can choose to use the stringData field instead. 
Note: 
1. If a key appears in both the data and the stringData field, the value specified in the stringData field takes precedence. 
2. When you retrieve the Secret data, it returns the encoded values, and not the plaintext values you provided in stringData.
